name: Laser Reflex
overview: Laser Reflex was developed by John Colin, Jon Malone and Mike Masters. It was published in 1984 by Talent Computing Systems for the BBC Microcomputer. A new angle in alien zapping! Against a brilliant backdrop of stars, you must defend your asteroid base from wave after wave of swooping, mutating starships. Your defense - a powerful laser deflected against a giant mirror. How long can you hold out before your defenses crumble?
